DOC.brief_summary: This trial evaluate use end tidal CO2 monitor ventilation delivery room . The use monitor compare clinical assessment ventilation . The hypothesis use monitor would result decrease incidence hypo- hypercapnia admission NICU .
DOC.brief_title: Quantitative End Tidal CO2 Monitoring Delivery Room ( DR )
DOC.criteria: Need ventilation delivery room Tracheal suction meconium Congenital Diaphragmatic Hernia Suspected hypoplasia lung Oligohydramnios < 28 week gestation AFI < 5 Known suspect airway anomaly Mother speak English Spanish Refusal consent
